summary: This bill, the Combat Action Recognition and Evaluation (CARE) for Remotely Piloted Aircraft (RPA) Crews Act of 2025, mandates that the Secretaries of the military departments create a combat status identifier for remotely piloted aircraft crew members who participate in combat operations. This identifier is meant to be equivalent in merit to existing combat status identifiers. The bill was introduced in the Senate on July 9, 2025.
